title: Luco de Jiloca Roman Bridge
description: A Roman bridge over the the modern Pancrudo river south of Luco de Jiloca in Teruel province, Aragon, Spain. The bridge crosses the river just below the modern Lechago dam, less than 100m before the Pancrudo's confluence with the Jiloca.

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: OSM Location of the Puento romano de Luco de Jiloca
